scripts.run:dev: yarn cross-env NODE_ENV=dev node -r dotenv/config -r source-map-support/register dist
scripts.run:hot: yarn cross-env NODE_ENV=dev yarn nodemon -r dotenv/config -r source-map-support/register dist --watch dist --watch .env
scripts.kube:dev: telepresence --swap-deployment identity --namespace develop --expose 3000 --method inject-tcp --run yarn cross-env NODE_ENV=dev node -r dotenv/config -r source-map-support/register dist
scripts.kube:hot: telepresence --swap-deployment identity --namespace develop --expose 3000 --method inject-tcp --run yarn cross-env NODE_ENV=dev yarn nodemon -r dotenv/config -r source-map-support/register dist --watch dist --watch .env
scripts.run:prod: yarn cross-env NODE_ENV=prod node -r dotenv/config dist
